QuestData.Title: Safe Haven
QuestData.Description: Let us return to Zereth Mortis. You should report back to Bolvar and tell him of what we have accomplished. We may have achieved this victory, but there is still much to be done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report back to Bolvar in Haven.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report back to Bolvar in Haven.
QuestData.RewardText:
A new Arbiter has been established? This is excellent news, $n, and a massive step towards restoring balance to the Shadowlands. Your efforts here will not be forgotten.
However, it is still only one step towards our goal. We must continue to strengthen our position in Zereth Mortis, and drive the Jailer's forces out.
Our work continues--but with you on our side, victory is that much closer. Thank you.
